paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val30Met, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: TTR-FAP with early symptoms of neuropathy

individual_records.phenotype_details: Mild paresthesias and hyperalgesia at the distal region of both lower limbs.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 29 years old woman recently diagnosed of TTR-FAP secondary to Val-30-Met mutation was derived in June 2012 to the Neurophysiology Department of our Institution for evaluation of polyneuropathy.

functional_data.summary: The patient showed full remission of neurological symptoms after transplantation.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family as the patient is a known carrier.
variants.additional_notes: The patient was asymptomatic until the onset of mild symptoms at age 29.
key_quotes: She had been known as an asymptomatic carrier since 2008.
In March 2012, she started to complain of mild paresthesias and hyperalgesia at the distal region of both lower limbs.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the TTR variant.
